A.Track: Not bad. This track is super popular right now so it's definitely good, but it's pretty basic.
A.Album: This album is super hot right now and it definitely has a lot of hits! You can't go wrong with putting this on the aux.
A.Playlist: Super popular playlist... like breathing air is popular.

B.Track: This track is great! Although it's not the most popular song, a good amount of listeners think this track smacks.
B.Album: Fire! This album has potential to be a classic and shows an excellent taste in music.
B.Playlist: Heat! This playlist has all the biggest hits and is very inoffensive to play.

C.Track: This track is nice! It's popularity shows that you must have a unique taste in music.
C.Album: This album has some heat and is worth going back to, with only a few skips.
C.Playlist: Exquisite! Despite not having the most popular songs, the song selection is hot!

D.Track: This track could be better, however it's most likely worth a listen!
D.Album: It's alright. There are some stand out songs on this album, but there are some songs that miss.
D.Playlist: Warm at best. The playlist has some good songs, but very little flavor.

F.Track: This song is not that popular and it leaves a lot to be desired.
F.Album: Chances are this album is slept on; a hidden gem perhaps. This shows unique and cultured taste in music... Or it's boring.
F.Playlist: Trash. This playlist only has mid, and is probably best listened to in the trash.

G.Playlist: I guess it's alright. The popularity suggests that you know what you like, and aren't afraid of your tastes.
